channel.title: READ! help with private server
channel.description: hey peoples i wana now how to make your own private server and have people join im kinda tierd of lossing connection or loseing my saved guy or the server being offline plz tell me if any of you guys now how to make a server and have people join :P thx

item.title: READ! help with private server
item.dc:creator: @da_crip da crip
item.description:
@da_crip wrote:

  1. get a source.

  2. download latest version of java (jdk 5 update 9)

  3. Change the compile to:

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

  1. Put your server on hamachi or get a no-ip.

Read full topic
